GK16visa01cu:0: prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ granthārambhe nirvinghena prāripsitaparisamāptikāmo vāṅmayādhikṛtatayā vāgdevatāyāḥ sāṃmukhyamādhatte--
GK16visa01cu:4: dṛṣṭvā bhūritadhvaniprabhṛtikālaṅkāraśāstraṃ muhu- stanmūlañca visṛṣṭamarthamakhilaṃ kāvyaprakāśasya ca /
GK16visa01cu:5: sāhityottaradarpaṇaṃ viśadayannāndayan sajjanān bhaṭṭācāryyamaheśvaro vitanute vijñāpriyāṃ ṭippaṇīm // 2 //
GK16visa01cu:10: ārambhakālasya sthūlatvād yogyatāvaśāt tatpūrvakāle eva sāmmukhyādhānaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa01cu:11: na ca śloke sāmmukhyādhānabodhakābhāvāt kathamidamābhāṣitamiti vācyam, śaradindvityādi tatsaundaryyakathanarūpastutyā svacetasi
GK16visa01cu:12_0: tamonāśār'tha prakāśanaprārthanayā ca tallābhāt, stutasyānukūlatvaniyamāt tadānukūlyaṃ pratyevābhīṣṭhaprārthanācca cetasyarthaprakāśe
GK16visa01cu:15_0: samāptimātrasya laukikāraṇādhīnatve 'pi tadvighnavighāto devatānukūlyādeveti vighnābhāvaviśiṣṭhasamāpti kāmanayāpi vighnābhāvarūpaviśeṣaṇāṃśo
GK16visa01cu:15_1: viṣayīkriyate ahaṃ sukhī syāmiti kāmanayā sukhaṃśā iva prāripsitagranthaparisamāptirūpe phale 'nyadevatāpekṣayā tasyāḥ śīghnakāritvapratipādanāya
GK16visa01cu:18: tathā ca vāgātmakasya granthasya nirvighnaparisamāptirūpaṃ phalaṃ vāgadhikāriṇyā śīghraṃ dātuṃ śakyameveti darśitam /
GK16visa01cu:27: pāraṃ sāhityavidyābdhergantuṃ vāñchanti ye kṣitau kṛtireṣā taristeṣāṃ viśvanāthamahākaveḥ śravyābhineyālaṅkāratattvaṃ satkavisammatam /
GK16visa01cu:28: yadihāsti tadanyatra yannehāsti na tat kvacit // 6 //
GK16visa01cu:31_0: iha khalu sūtrāṇāmevārthaṃ vṛttyā viśadīkurvan granthādau vighnavighātāya avigītasadācāraparamparāprāptatayā svābhīṣṭadevatārādhanena
GK16visa01cu:36: vāṅmayetyanena svaśāstravidheyavagvaibhavadātṛtayā hmādidevārādhyatvena bhagavatyāḥ prakṛtārthanirvāhakatvaṃ mcitam /
GK16visa01cu:41_0: śaradinduvat sundararuciḥ, sā prasiddhāgirāṃ devī sarasvatī, me mama cetasi santataṃ vistṛtaṃ, tamaḥ tamastulyamajñānam,
GK16visa01cu:41_1: apahṛtya, akhilān mayā vakṣyamāṇān arthān prakāśayatvityarthaḥ atrādye pāde luptopamāmahimnā śaradindorapi sundararucitvaṃ
GK16visa01cu:41_2: santataṃ tamaḥ padārthāndhakāranāśakatvaṃ ghaṭapaṭādyakhilārthaprakāśakatvaṃ ca siddhyati /
GK16visa01cu:42: tathā ca ebhiḥ sādharmyaiḥ śaradindugīrdevyorupamānopameyabhāva iti bodhyam /
GK16visa01cu:47: asya granthasya kāvyāṅgatayā kāvyaphalaireva phalavattvamiti kāvyaphalānyāha--
GK16visa01cu:56: pravṛttinivṛttyupadeśadvāreṇeti--pravṛttyupadeśena pravṛttasya dharmotpattiḥ sākṣādeva, nivṛttyupadeśena nivṛttasya dharmotpattiḥ
GK16visa01cu:69: nanu kathaṃ kavinoptāditetivṛttānāṃ mālatīmādhavaratnāvalīmṛcchakaṭikādīnāṃ svābhidheyeṣu prāmāṇyam ?
GK16visa01cu:74: natu prakārabhedāḥ prahelikā vyahgyārthaviśiṣṭhā nīrasā vākyaviśeṣāḥ
GK16visa01cu:75: yathā- ke dārapoṣaṇaratāḥ kā śītalāmbuvāhinī gaṅgā /
GK16visa01cu:76: kaṃ saṃjaghāna kṛṣṇaḥ kaṃ balavantaṃ na bādhate śītam “iti /
GK16visa01cu:77: atra hi praśnarūpor'tho vācyaḥ, uttararūpaśca vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:84: iha ca nyāyo 'yamanvācayaḥ, prakaraṇādi pramāṇaṃ rasāsvādajanakatvāt
GK16visa01cu:85: kāvyatvādvā, yadevaṃ tadevaṃ, yathā rāmāyaṇādi, tathā cedaṃ, tasmāttatheti
GK16visa01cu:86: na yadevaṃ na tadevaṃ yathā praheliketi /
GK16visa01cu:87: nanu rasarūpapramāṇatvepi prakaraṇādeḥ ratyāsvādānantaramasadbhūtatvenārthānarthopadarśanābhāvāddhitāhitapravṛtt inivṛttikāritvaprayojitaṃ kathaṃ hi śāstratvamiti na vācyam /
GK16visa01cu:100: karoti kīrtiṃ prītiṃ ca sādhukāvyaniṣevaṇam” // iti /
GK16visa01cu:103: śabdaḥ suprayuktaḥ samyagjñātaḥ svarge loke kāmadhugbhavati”
GK16visa01cu:109: (vi, gha) kalā vaidagdhī, vaicakṣaṇyaṃ pravarttakaṃ jñānaṃ
GK16visa01cu:114: tathā ca samastakāvyaprayojanam--”kāvyaṃ yaśaser'thakṛteṭha iti yat kāvyaprakāśakāreṇoktaṃ tacca “karoti kīrttiṃ prītiṃ ca” ityatraivoktam,
GK16visa01cu:120: caturvargaprāptirhi vedaśāstrebhyo nīrasatayā duḥkhādeva pariṇatabuddhīnāmeva jāyate /
GK16visa01cu:123: (vi, ṅa) nanu caturvargaphalasādhake vedaśāstre sati kimarthaṃ lokaḥ
GK16visa01cu:130: nanu tahi pariṇatabuddhibhiḥ satsu vedaśāstreṣu kimiti kāvye yatnaḥ karaṇīya ityapi na vaktavyam
GK16visa01cu:131: kaṭukauṣadhopaśamanīyasya rogasya sitaśarkaropaśamanīyatve kasya vā rogiṇaḥ sitaśarkarāpravṛttiḥ sādhīyasī na syāt ? kiñca kāvyasyopādeyatvamagnipurāṇe 'pyuktam--
GK16visa01cu:133: kavitvaṃ durlabhaṃ tatra śaktistatra sudurlabhā” // iti /
GK16visa01cu:140: tena hetunā tasya kāvyasya svarūpaṃ nirūpyate /
GK16visa01cu:146: (lo, ū) śaktiḥ kavitvabījarūpaḥ saṃskāraviśeṣaḥ yāṃ vinā kāvyaṃ na
GK16visa01cu:150: darśayannāha--tat kiṃ svarūpamityāha--”tadadoṣāviti” taditi kāvyam, doṣāḥ
GK16visa01cu:151: śrutikaṭvādayaḥ, guṇā mādhuryyādayaḥ, kvāpyanalaṅkṛtītyanena sarvatra sālaṅkārau śabdārthau kāvyam, kvacittu sphuṭālaṅkāravirahe 'pi na kāvyatvahāniriti /
GK16visa01cu:159: “nyakkāro hyayameva me yadarayastatrāpyasau tāpasaḥ so 'pyatraiva nihanti rākṣasakulaṃ jīvatyaho rāvaṇaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:160: dhigdhikchakrajitaṃ prabodhitavatā kiṃ kumbhakarṇena vā svargagrāmaṭikāviluṇṭhanavṛthocchūnaiḥ kimebhirbhujaiḥ” // iti /
GK16visa01cu:166: āstāṃ so 'pi sindhorudīcītīre kharadūṣaṇādihantā, so 'pyatraiva nihanti rākṣasakulaṃ natu dvitrirākṣasān /
GK16visa01cu:168: bhavatu vā mama daivasya prātikūlyādevaṃ, śakrasya jetāram arthāt
GK16visa01cu:169: meghanādaṃ mama putraṃ dhik dhik, tathā prabodhitavatā prabodhitaṃ
GK16visa01cu:170: prabodhaḥ tadvatā bhāvaktantatvena prabodhavatā kumbhakarṇena vā kiṃ phalamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:171: natvatra ktavatuḥ, tasya karmaṇyanabhidhānāt, tathā mama bhujairvāpi
GK16visa01cu:172: kim ? kīdṛśaiḥ, mama viluṇṭhane svargo 'pi grāmaṭikā svalpagrāmaḥ,
GK16visa01cu:178: asya śalokasya vidheyāvimarśadoṣaduṣṭatayā kāvyatvaṃ na syāt /
GK16visa01cu:182: (vi, jha) vidheyāvimarśeti--vidheyasya nyakkārasyoddeśyādarimattvāt pūrvanipātāt “anuvādyamanuktvaina vidheyamudīrayet” iti niyamāt /
GK16visa01cu:187: kāvyaprakāśakṛtā kāvyaprakāśe, “idamuttamamatiśayini vyaṅgye vācyād dhvanirbudhaiḥ kathitaḥ” ityanena lakṣaṇena dhvaniyuktatvādasya
GK16visa01cu:188: uttamakāvyatvasvīkārāt, tasmādavyāptidoṣa iti---atra doṣasāmānyābhāvo lakṣaṇaghaṭaka iti tadabhiprāyamunnīya idamuktam, tasya tu śābdabodhavighaṭakadoṣasāmānyābhāva evābhiprayaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:189: anyathā “tathābhūtāṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpasadasi pāñcālatanayām” ityādiślekaḥ kākusahakṛtadhvanyudāharaṇatayoktvā kathaṃ tenaiva nyūnapadatvadoṣe udāhṛtaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:190: kathaṃ vā “kṛtamanumataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vā yairidaṃ gurupātakam” ityādiślekaḥ raudrarasodāharaṇatvenoktvāpi punaruktadoṣatve udāhṛtaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:194_0: vṛthocchūnairityatra bhujāmucchūnatayā bṛthāttvasya tatkālamātrajātatvābhiprayeṇa vidheyatāṃ netumucitasya tatpuruṣasamāsena
GK16visa01cu:198_0: tathā hi, ayamevetyanyayogavyavacchedasūcakasya evakārasya, me iti kākupadasya, araya iti bahuvacanasya, atraiveti sarvanāmnaḥ,
GK16visa01cu:198_1: nihanti jīvatīti tiṅaḥ, aho ityavyayasya, rāvaṇa iti tat tat
GK16visa01cu:201: viṭhṭhuṇaṭhaneti vyupasargasya, bhujairiti bahuvacanasya tadvyañjakaviśeṣatvāt asaṃlakṣyakamo
GK16visa01cu:205_0: nanu kaścidevāṃśo 'tra duṣṭo na punaḥ sarvo 'pīti cet, tarhi yatrāṃśe doṣaḥ so 'kāvyatvaprayojakaḥ, yatra dhvaniḥ sa uttamakāvyatvaprayojaka
GK16visa01cu:205_1: ityaṃśābhyāmubhayata ākṛṣyamāṇamidaṃ kāvyamakāvyaṃ vā kimapi na syāt /
GK16visa01cu:206: na ca kaṃcidevāṃśaṃ kāvyasya dūṣayantaḥ śratiduṣṭādayo doṣāḥ, kiṃ tarhi sarvameva kāvyam
GK16visa01cu:214: nanvaṃśaviśeṣasthitena doṣeṇa aparāṃśādūṣaṇāttadaṃśe kāvyatvaṃ doṣavadaṃśe cākāvyatvaṃ syādata āha--naceti /
GK16visa01cu:215: kiṃ tarhi samastameveti, samastasyaiva dūṣaṇe yuktimāha--tathā
GK16visa01cu:219: cyutasaṃskārādayaḥ samastarasāpakarṣakatvānnityāḥ, śrutiduṣṭatvaṃ tu katipayaśṛṅgarādirasāpakarṣatvādanityamityabhiyuktakṛtāṃ vyavasthāpi na
GK16visa01cu:223: idaṃ padyam, nanu padaikasyaiva viṣayasya viruddhadharmayogaḥ syāt /
GK16visa01cu:224: iha tu doṣasya yadaṅgasya dūṣakatvaṃ tasyākāvyatvam, dhvaneśca yasyotkarṣakatvaṃ tasyottamakāvyatvamiti dvayorna virodhaḥ ityāśaṅkyāha-na
GK16visa01cu:230: hiraudrādirase prarūḍhaśrutikaṭutvasya guṇatvam, yathā mama tātapādānāṃ
GK16visa01cu:233: arddhepārīndramarddhenaramahaha mahālokamālokya lokāḥ stokāstokāviśeṣāḥ śaraṇamupayayurvāridhiṃ vāridhiṃ vā” //
GK16visa01cu:236: dhvanyātmanyeva śṛṅgāre te heyā ityudāhṛtāḥ” // iti /
GK16visa01cu:238: kiñca evaṃ kāvyaṃ praviralaviṣayaṃ nirviṣayaṃ vā syāt, sarvathā nirdeṣasyaikāntamasaṃbhavāt
GK16visa01cu:244: doṣatāprayojakaṃ tu na rasāpakarṣakatvaṃ, kintvabhyuktoktittatsvarūpameva tatprayojakamityata āha--kiṃceti /
GK16visa01cu:250: nanvīṣadarthe nañaḥ prayoga iti cettarhi “īṣaddoṣau śabdārthau kāvyam”
GK16visa01cu:253: (vi, ṭha) īṣadarthe naña iti---adoṣāviti naña ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:261: nirdeṣayoḥ kvacit kadācit kavinādoṣabhāvena nirmitayoḥ kāvyatvaṃ na
GK16visa01cu:263: sati saṃbhave “īṣaddoṣau” iti cet , etadapi kāvyalakṣaṇo na vācyam ,
GK16visa01cu:265: nahī kīṭānuvedhādayo ratnasya ratnatvaṃ vyāhantumīśāḥ kintūpādeyatāratamyameva kartum /
GK16visa01cu:269: duṣṭeṣvapi matā yatra rasādyanugamaḥ sphuṭaḥ” // iti /
GK16visa01cu:272: (vi, ḍa) sati sambhava iti---sphuṭadāṣarahite kadācidīṣaddoṣasya sambhave satītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:273: uktañceti---yatra rasādīnāmasaṃlakṣyakramāṇām anugamaḥ sphuṭaḥ tatra duṣṭeṣvapi kīṭānuviddharatnādisādhāraṇyena kāvyatā matā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:279: guṇānāṃ rasaikadharmatvasya “ye rasasyāṅgino dharmāḥ śauryādaya ivātmanaḥ”
GK16visa01cu:283: (vi, ḍha) evamadoṣāviti viśeṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitvā saguṇāviti viśeṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitumāha--kiñceti
GK16visa01cu:287: (lo, au) evamadoṣatvasya kāvyalakṣaṇatvaṃ dūṣayitvā saguṇatvasyāpi dūṣayati /
GK16visa01cu:293: rasābhivyañjakau bhavato 'pyanumatau; tena rasādirūpavyaṅgyarūpāṇāmapi mādhuryyārdānāṃ vyañjakarūpaśabdārthadharmatvenopacāraḥ /
GK16visa01cu:294: yadāha sa eva “guṇavṛttyā punasteṣāṃ sthitiḥ śabdārthayormatā”iti /
GK16visa01cu:296: upacārataḥ saguṇau śabdārthau kāvyamiti yaducyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:298: tayoḥ kāvyasvarūpeṇābhimatayoḥ śabdārthayo raso 'sti, na vā ? nāsti cet,
GK16visa01cu:300: asti cet ? kathaṃ noktaṃ rasavantāviti viśeṣaṇam /
GK16visa01cu:304: saguṇayo raso 'sti naveti, ayamarthaḥ--rasasya sadbhāve eva kāvyatvaṃ
GK16visa01cu:309: kathamiti--ayamāśayaḥ, yadi guṇābhivyañjakayoḥ śabdārthayoḥ satoreva kāvyalakṣaṇatvamābhimataṃ tadā lakṣaṇasya nyūnapadatvam /
GK16visa01cu:310: guṇavattvānyathānupapattyaitallabhyata iti cet ? tarhi sarasāvityeva vaktuṃ yuktam , na saguṇāviti /
GK16visa01cu:315: śauryyadyāśrayaprāṇyāśraye deśe 'nayā śauryyādimanto deśā iti kenāpi nocyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:316: idaṃ ca granthakṛtā'ropabījānavadhānādekoktam; tathā hi paramparāghaṭakya madhyabhūtasambandhino bahirindriyapratyakṣatve satyeva naikamāropaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:317: yatra tu paramparāghaṭakamadhyabhūtasambandhī na bahīrindriyaprataykṣastatratvevamārepo dṛśyata eva /
GK16visa01cu:318: yathā śīto vāyuruṣṇaṃ jalaṃ sugandhirvāyurittra paramparāsambandhaghaṭakānāṃ madhyabhūtajalāgnipuṣpāvayavānāṃ sūkṣyamatvenāpratyakṣatvāt tādṛśa āropaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:319: prakṛte 'pi bahirindriyāprataykṣasya rasādeśca paramparāsambandhaghaṭakatvāt sambhavatyeva guṇavattāropaḥ śabdārthayoriti
GK16visa01cu:324: yadi ca tādṛśaropo nāsti tadā kāraṇāntarābhāvasyaiva tatra kalpanīyatvāt /
GK16visa01cu:325: ata enodayanācāryyairuktam, “ārope sati nimittānusaraṇaṃ na tu nimittamasti ityāropaḥ” iti
GK16visa01cu:326: yastu javākusumasya vahirindriyapratyakṣatve 'pi lohitaḥ sphaṭika ityāropaḥ tatra javākusumaṃ nedṛśaparamparāghaṭakaṃ javākusumasya sphaṭikāvṛttitvāt /
GK16visa01cu:327: kintu javākusumasya svacchadravyasānnidhyameva tadrahitaṃ pṛthagevāropanimittamiti sudhībhiravadheyam
GK16visa01cu:329: (lo, ā) guṇavattveti--saguṇāviti padenaiva śabdārthayoḥ sarasatvamuktamityarthaḥ, tarheti--yadi sarasatvapratipādanāya saguṇāvityuktamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:330: tena alaṅkārāḥ kaṭakakuṇḍalādivaditi vacanena alaṅkārasyotkarṣamātrādhāyakatvāt lakṣaṇaṃ parāstamityarthaḥ
GK16visa01cu:332: tathā hi, kāvyatvasāmānyasya kiṃ śabdārthayoḥ saṃyogādivad vyāsajyavṛttitvam ? uta gotvādivat pratyekaparisamāptivṛttitvam ? nādyaḥ sāmānyatvādeva /
GK16visa01cu:334: etacca etadgranthakṛtā svakṛtāyāṃ kāvyaprakāśaṭīkāyāṃ likhitamapi prācīnagauravaniyantritenātropekṣitam
GK16visa01cu:335: adoṣatvādīnāṃ tu kāvyalakṣaṇatve prameyārthavirodhaprasaṅga iti tannirākṛtam //
GK16visa01cu:337: prayojyāvityabhiprāya iti cet ? na, guṇābhivyañjakaśabdārthavattvasya kāvye utkaṣamātrādhāyakatvam , na tu svarūpādhāyakatvam /
GK16visa01cu:339: (vi, ta) idānīṃ saguṇatvaviśeṣaṇasya na lakṣaṇaghaṭakatvaṃ kintu kavyupadeśaparatvamityāśaṅkate, nanu śabdārthāviti dūṣayati---cenneti /
GK16visa01cu:344: na tu svarūpādhāyakatvāmityasya svarūpe lakṣaṇe na
GK16visa01cu:348: “kāvyasya śabdārthau śarīram , rasādiścātmā, guṇāḥ śauryādivat, doṣāḥ
GK16visa01cu:351: etena “analaṅkṛtī punaḥ kvāpi” iti yaduktam, tadapi parāstam /
GK16visa01cu:352: asyārthaḥ- sarvatra sālaṅkārau kvacittvasphuṭālaṅkārāvapi śabdārthau kāvyamiti /
GK16visa01cu:368: yaḥ kaumāraharaḥ sa eva hi varastā eva caitrakṣapā- ste conmīlitamālatīsurabhayaḥ prauḍhāḥ kadambānilāḥ /
GK16visa01cu:369: sā caivāsmi tathāpi tatra suratavyāpāralīlāvidhau revārodhasi vetasītarutale cetaḥ samutkaṇṭhate iti /
GK16visa01cu:373: (vi, da) “yaḥ kaumārahara'; ityādiślokam asphuṭālaṅkārodāharaṇatayā kāvyaprakāśakāra udāhṛtavān, tatra sphuṭālaṅkāra evāstītyāha---yacceti /
GK16visa01cu:375: revātīre kṛtasaṅketāyāḥ kulaṭāyāḥ svagṛhe iyaṃ bhāvanā /
GK16visa01cu:376: utkaṇṭhākaraṇaṃ mama yadyapi nāsti tathāpi tatra kṛtasaṅkete revārodhasi revātīre vetasīnāmatarutale suratavyāpārarūpalīlāvidhinimittaṃ cetaḥ samutkaṇṭhate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:379: sa eva varaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ, yatheṣṭaratisamartha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:380: caitrakṣapā api saṅketasthala ivātrāpyaviśiṣṭā ityāha--”tā eva'; iti
GK16visa01cu:383: ata eva te prauḍhāḥ api mandatvaparyyavasannāḥ vanānilasya prauḍhatve 'pi mandatvaṃ vahabahirbhāvena
GK16visa01cu:385: caitre kadambapuṣpasyābhāva eva, kecittu dhūlīkadambapuṣpaparatayā vyācakṣate /
GK16visa01cu:386: tanmate vāyoḥ prauḍhatvaviśeṣaṇānaucityāpatteḥ anye tūnmīlitamālatīnāṃ te ca prauḍhasurabhayo ghrāṇatarpaṇagandhāḥ, iti vāyacakṣate /
GK16visa01cu:388: tadā kadambānilā ityatra te ca ityasyābhāvāt, pratyatrijñānupapatteḥ
GK16visa01cu:390: sā ceti ahamapi tadavasthaiva, ubhayatra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:393: (lo, ī) evaṃ kāvyalakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitvā kāvyaprakāśakṛtaḥ sphuṭālaṅkāravirahodāharaṇe sphuṭālaṅkāraṃ
GK16visa01cu:395: “yaḥ kaumāreti'; kaumāraṃ navayauvanam, tadakṛtakapremāsakṛttayā yo 'tivāhitavān sa kaumāraharaḥ varaḥ svayaṃvṛtaḥ, natu pitrādibhirgrāhitaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:396: caitro vasanta;, tatra jātikadambābhāvāt, mālatī vāsantikā /
GK16visa01cu:398: saṃpradāyavidastu sa eva vasantaḥ tā eva varṣā iti manmathoddīpakatvāviśeṣād ṛtudvayasyāpi graha iti vyācakṣate /
GK16visa01cu:405: “sati hetau phalābhāve viśeṣoktiḥ” iti ca lakṣaṇasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt;
GK16visa01cu:410: tathā hi kāraṇābhāve phalāt kāraṇasadbhāve phalābhāvācca vismayasya utthāpitattvāttat sthāyibhāvako 'dbhutarasaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:413: kiṃ vā sa eva rasābhāsādbhutarasasyāṅgamiti prayo 'laṅkāracha,
GK16visa01cu:416_0: sphuṭatvamati---idaṃ ca na ruciraṃ dūṣaṇaṃ, tathā hi sphuṭatvāsphuṭatve tāvat śīghrapratīyamānatvāpratīyamānatvābhyāmeva,
GK16visa01cu:416_1: tathā cātra kāraṇabhāvaphalābhāvayorvācakasya naño 'bhāvena tat kalpanāyā vilambenāsphuṭatvāt evaṃ tayorasphuṭatvācca sutarāṃ
GK16visa01cu:418: (lo, u) atra hīti kāraṇābhāve kāryyotpattirvibhāvanā sā cātrāsphuṭā /
GK16visa01cu:419: ye khalu utkaṇṭhāyāḥ kāraṇāni priyasaṅgamābhāvādayaḥ, tadabhāve
GK16visa01cu:421: yadi khalu priyasaṅgamābhāvādīnāṃ kāraṇānāmasadbhāvamukhena varṇanaṃ tadeva tasyāḥ sphuṭatvam
GK16visa01cu:424: atra ca teṣu satkhapi dhṛtirnotpannetyutkaṇṭhotpattimukhena varṇitam,
GK16visa01cu:428: evamatra dvayorvibhāvanāviśeṣoktyorasphuṭārthatvāt sphuṭālaṅkāraviraha iti kāvyaprakāśakṛto matam /
GK16visa01cu:430: tathāpi tadubhayārabdhasandehe saṅkarālaṅkārasya sphuṭatvāt kathaṃ sphuṭālaṅkāraviraha iti
GK16visa01cu:434: rasānvitaṃ kaviḥ kurvan kīrtiṃ prītiṃ ca vindati” //
GK16visa01cu:441: viśeṣaścātra sarasāviti vacane śrutyarthatvena saguṇāviti vacanaṃ samanantaroktarītyānarthakam
GK16visa01cu:452: na ca tadapi kāvyameveti vācyaṃ vyaṅgyasyāsvādyatvavaśādeva kāvyātmatvakathanāt /
GK16visa01cu:454: abodhyatvādeva tasya vaicitryam, natvāsvādyavyaṅgyatvam, tathā hi--
GK16visa01cu:457: '; ityatra yaḥ pūrṇakalaśo vyaṅgyastasyābodhyatāyāmeva kavestātparyyādatraiva vaicitryeṇa alaṅkāra eva prahelikā /
GK16visa01cu:458: yattu asphuṭākhye guṇībhūte vyaṅgye kṛcchragamyatvaṃ tatra kṛcchragamyatāyāṃ na kavestātparyyamatastasya
GK16visa01cu:462: mayāpi “vākyaṃ rasātmakaṃ kāvyam'; iti vakṣyamāṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:472: kaṃ saṃjaghāna kṛṣṇaḥ kaṃ balavantaṃ na bādhate śītam” //
GK16visa01cu:474: tathā hi--dārāṇāṃ bhāryyāṇāṃ poṣaṇe ratāḥ ke ? śītambuvāhinī gaṃgā kā
GK16visa01cu:475: ? kaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ saṃjaghāna ? balavantaṃ kaṃ na bādhate śītam ? iti praśnaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:479: (vi, pha) nanu yadi vyaṅgyo rasa eva kāvyasyātmā tadā vastuno vyaṅgyatve kathaṃ kāvyatvamityāśaṅkate “nanu rasādimātreti” /
GK16visa01cu:481: attā ettha ṇimajjai ettha ahaṃ diasaaṃ paloehi /
GK16visa01cu:482: mā pahia rattiandhia sejjāe maha ṇimajjahisi //
GK16visa01cu:484: (vi, ba) attā ettheti--- “śvaśrūratra nimajjati atrāhaṃ divasakaṃ
GK16visa01cu:487: “ rātryandhatvena kathitātmānaṃ svagṛhe kṛtāvāsaṃ pathikaṃ prati
GK16visa01cu:492: (lo, ṝ) atteti--divasakamiti kāle karma, atra puṃścalīvacanena mat
GK16visa01cu:499: ityādau vastumātrasya vyaṅgyatve kathaṃ kāvyavyavahāra iti cet ?
GK16visa01cu:508: anyathā “devadatto grāmaṃ yāti” iti vākye tadbhṛtyasya
GK16visa01cu:510: astviti cet ? na, rasavata eva kāvyatvāṅgīkārāt /
GK16visa01cu:511: kāvyasya prayojanaṃ hi rasāsvādasukhapiṇḍadānadvārā vedaśāstravimukhānāṃ sukumāramatīnāṃ rājaputrādīnāṃ vineyānāṃ “rāmādivatpravartitavyaṃ na
GK16visa01cu:518: tathā ca---”śūnyaṃ vāsagṛhamityādi'; “yaḥ kaumārahara'; ityādiślekeṣu tādṛśopadeśābhāve 'pi kāvyatvamakṣuṇṇam /
GK16visa01cu:520: (lo, ḷ) kāvyasyeti--ayamarthaḥ, rasāsvāda eva mukhaṃ piṇḍasya dvāreṇa taduktam--- “svādukāvyarasonmiśraṃ vākyārthamupayuñjate /
GK16visa01cu:538: nanu tarhi prabandhāntarvartināṃ keṣāṃcinnīrasānāṃ padyānāṃ kāvyatvaṃ na syāditi cet ? na, rasavatpadyāntargatanīrasapadānāmiva padyarasena,
GK16visa01cu:540: yattu nīraseṣvapi guṇābhivyañjakavarṇasadbhāvaddoṣābhāvādalaṅkārasadbhāvācca kāvyavyavahāraḥ sa rasādimatkāvyabandhasāmāyādrauṇa eva /
GK16visa01cu:549: yadyapi varṇo guṇasyaiva vyañjako na kriyāyāstathāpi atra varṇapadaṃ varṇādiparaṃ bodhyam
GK16visa01cu:557: atra vācyapadaṃ pratīyamānapadārthavyaṅgyabhinnaparam, tena lakṣaṇārthasyāpi parigrahaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:566: “rasyate iti rasaḥ” iti vyutpattiyogādbhāvatadābhāsādayo 'pi gṛhyante tatra raso yathā--
GK16visa01cu:572: (lo, ai) evaṃ prāktanalakṣaṇānāṃ prameyavirodhaṃ darśayitvā svalakṣaṇāmavatārayati /
GK16visa01cu:576: rasyate āsvādyate, svādaḥ kāvyārthasambhedādātmānandasamudbhava ityuktaprakāraḥ, karmatvaṃ rasādīnāmupacārāt /
GK16visa01cu:578: tadābhāsāḥ rasābhāsā bhāvābhāsāśca ādiśabdāt bhāvasya śāntirudayaḥ sandhiḥ śabalatā ca /
GK16visa01cu:579: śūnyaṃ vāsagṛhaṃ vilokya śayanādutthāya kiñcicchanairnidrāvyājamupāgatasya suciraṃ nirvarṇya patyurmukham /
GK16visa01cu:580: vistrabdhaṃ paricumbya jātapulakāmālokya gaṇḍasthalīṃ lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa isatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā //
GK16visa01cu:584: atra vilokyetyādikrameṇaiva sakalakriyāṇāṃ pūrvāparabhāvaḥ ktvānirddiṣṭo bodhyaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:588: viśrabdhaṃ nidrāniścayena jātāśvāsaṃ, yathā syāt tathā
GK16visa01cu:589: cumbanakriyāviśeṣaṇamidam, ālokya lajjānamramukhī jātā iti śeṣaḥ mukhena
GK16visa01cu:592: etat paryyantākriyāsu bālā karttre, hāsapriyacumbanasya tu karma /
GK16visa01cu:597: tā eva nāyakarateruddīpanavibhāvācha, priyeṇa cumbanaṃ tadīyahāsaśca
GK16visa01cu:598: tadīyarateranubhāvau, tāveva nāyikārateruddīpanavibhāvau, ubhayābhijñe sāmājike rasotpattiḥ
GK16visa01cu:600: (lo, o) śūnyamiti-śūnyaṃ viviktaṃ vāsagṛhaṃ kelibhavanaṃ vilokya,
GK16visa01cu:601: śayanāt, śayyāyāḥ kiñcidutthāya utthitā bhūtvā śanairmandaṃ niḥ
GK16visa01cu:603: bālā nidrāvyājamuphagatasya priyasya mukhaṃ suciraṃ nirvarṇya dīrghakālaṃ vilokya samyak parīkṣya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:604_0: viśrabdhaṃ niḥ śaṅkaṃ yathā syāttathā paricumbya āsvādya jātapulakā utphullaromāñcāṅkitāṃ gaṇḍasthalīṃ vilokya lajjānamramukhī
GK16visa01cu:604_1: vrīḍāvanatavadanā satī hasatā priyeṇa ciraṃ cumbiteti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:613: utthānasya śanaistvena trāsaḥ, ciraṃ nirvarṇanena supto na veti sandehaprabhavo vitarkaḥ, viśrabdhamityanena nidrāniścayajñānena harṣaḥ,
GK16visa01cu:614: paricumbanenautsukyam, ālokanena capalatā, viśrabdhamityanena lajjā nirddiṣṭaiva /
GK16visa01cu:615: nāyakagatā ca vyājanidrāśrayeṇa dhṛtiḥ, ciraparicumbanenautsukyaṃ harṣaśca /
GK16visa01cu:622: krodhe kṣaagaṇaḥ, śare daśamukhaḥ, pāṇau pralambāsuro, dhyāne
GK16visa01cu:627: asmai yatpadopasthāpitāya kasmaicit anirvacanīyāya arthāddaśāvatāriṇe nārāyaṇāya namaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:629: uladhito 'pi matsyasya prauḍhoktyā mahattvāt tacchalkasīmni layaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:646: madhu dvirephaḥ kusumaikaṇatre papau priyāṃ svāmanuvartamānaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:649: (vi, ṣa) madhudvirepha iti---maheśatapobhaṅgāyā'kālike vasante jāte tiraścāmapi mānmathakriyāvarṇanamidam
GK16visa01cu:650: atra priyayā sāhityena madhupānaṃ priyākaṇḍūyanaṃ ca dvirephakṛṣṇasārayo rateranubhāvau /
GK16visa01cu:660: (lo, ā) doṣāḥ punariti---yeṣāṃ sadbhāvena kāvyatvaṃ khaṇiḍatamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:661: kiṃ svarūpāḥ kimākāreṇa varttante iti pūrvavad vyākhyānam /
GK16visa01cu:681: ataśca “guṇābhiñjakāḥ śabdā rasasyotkarṣakāḥ” ityuktaṃ bhavatīti prāgevoktam /
GK16visa01cu:685: śabdārthadharmāṇāmeva sambhavati rasamātradharmāṇāmeva guṇānāṃ kathaṃ taddvārakatvaṃ vyākhyātamityata āha---iheti /
GK16visa01cu:687: yadyapi varṇā eva guṇābhivyañjakā iti vakṣyante tathāpi varṇena padaṃtenārthastena ca guṇo vyajyate, ityabhiprāyeṇa arthasya guṇābhivyañjakatvamuktam /
GK16visa01cu:688: tathā ca svāvyākhyātārtha evānenopapāditaḥ svayaṃ, tathā vyākhyāne tu
GK16visa01cu:689: guṇānāṃ sākṣādrasopakārakatvenaiva kārikārthaḥ saṃgacchate iti bodhyam /
GK16visa01cu:692: tat kathamidamuktamiti cet, satyam kintūtkarṣahetavaḥ proktā
GK16visa01cu:693: guṇālaṅkārarītaya ityuktau alaṅkārarītyoḥ samabhivāyahāreṇa pāṭhavaśāt tadrītikatvalābhaḥ
GK16visa01cu:698_0: pātitvādirūpeṇa pratipādayiṣyamāṇāḥ prācīnoktāḥ śleṣaprasādādayaḥ tadyuktaśabdaḥ cārthaśca prācīnoktaśleṣaprasādādiguṇayuktaḥ
GK16visa01cu:698_1: tayoḥ rasādirūpavyaṅgyānāṃ guṇānāṃ vyañjakatvena upacaryyate, tadāha kāvyaprakāśakāra eva, “guṇavṛttyā punasteṣāṃ sthitiḥ
GK16visa01cu:699: nanu bhavanmate mādhuryyādayastraya eva guṇāste ca rasamātraniṣṭāḥ /
GK16visa01cu:700: prācīnoktāḥ śleṣaprasādādayaḥ śabdārthaniṣṭatvena viṃsātiprakārāste ca bhavadbhirasvīkṛtatvena ca nirddeṣṭavyāḥ; tat kathamidānīṃ tadyuktayoḥ
GK16visa01cu:701: śabdārthayorvyañjakatvam ? ucyate na khalu teṣāmakhīkāraḥ, kintu antarbhāvitvādirūpeṇa śabdārthamātraniṣṭatvāt rasamātraniṣṭaguṇavaijātyāt na pṛthaguktiḥ /
GK16visa01cu:703: na vayaṃ teṣāṃ yathāsambhavaṃ sasadharmatvenoktānāṃ vyañjakatvaṃ na
